sqlMap.sql: select * from tbl_book t order by t.bid

SELECT t.bid, t.b_name, t.author, t.country, t.age, t.pub_date, t.pub_house, t.type as type_id, t2.description as type, t.rectime, t.serial_no, t.remarks FROM tbl_book t, tbl_book_type t2 where t.type = t2.t_no and t.bid = :bid;
insert into tbl_book (bid, b_name, author, country, age, pub_date, pub_house, type, serial_no, remarks) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
update tbl_book t set t.b_name = ?, t.author = ?, t.country = ?, t.age = ?, t.pub_date = ?, t.pub_house = ?, t.type = ?, t.serial_no = ?, t.remarks = ? where t.bid = ?
